Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Goblet
Description: Wide goblet with high ring base, restricted mouth and thick lip resting on a slight flaring of the upper section of the body. The vessel is made from a fine pinkish clay. Two horizontal lines were incised on the exterior surface of upper half of the body. The foot is rather high and it flares slightly near the bottom.
